column1: Local Foods////They're quite creative and innovative with the sandwiches on their menu. A particular favorite of mine is their duck confit (nom). Their organic concept is quite appealing
column2: as there aren't many other restaurants in Houston with their same eclectic feel. The sides are definitely interesting
column3: but don't fail on taste. My favorites are the kale and beets. It's a delicious take on vegetables I think many people aren't too keen on trying.
